articles.author: Iain Carter
articles.title: Xander Schauffele: American passes ultimate examination to win at Royal Troon - BBC.com
articles.description: The 152nd Open should be remembered as a classic, writes BBC golf correspondent Iain Carter.
articles.content: While Xander Schauffele celebrates completing the first American shutout of the four men's majors in 42 years, it is worth reflecting on the maddening magnificence of UK links golf at its highest lev… [+2768 chars]
